answers.answer: HI and thanks for  using the forum.You need to see your regular primary care physician about this.  There are a lot of possible causes for your symptoms including hypoglycemia, seizures, heart problems, etc and you really need to be evaluated to find out what is going on.  I urge you to get checked out ASAP- you would not want something like this to happen while you were driving or taking a bath- this could be very dangerous.  Good luck.Bridget
